title: This Week in Coins: Despite ETF Hype, Bitcoin and Ethereum Plunge Hard
description: Bitcoin has taken a big hit over the past seven days following the launch of long-awaited spot Bitcoin ETFs on Wall Street.

title: Study Shows Number of Crypto Developers Up by 52% Since 2018
description: Over the past five years, the number of established developers with more than 2 years experience of working in crypto grew at an annualized rate of 52%. title: 3 cryptos below $0.1 with similar potential like Solana (SOL)

title: IMF Warns: Artificial Intelligence Could Aggravate Income Inequality
description: Explore the IMF's stark warning about AI's impact on income inequality, with insights on job disruption, wage gaps, and the crucial need for global AI readiness.

title: Binance Trader sets Bitcoin Target Price at $100k for this date

title: Ripple President’s vague XRP adoption remarks stir concern
description: Ripple president Monica Long‘s recent comments in an interview with the Chain Reaction Pod have sparked a wave of concern in the XRP community. The interview, which centered on the implications of the U.S. court ruling declaring XRP as not a security for retail investors, left many anticipating a clear stance on XRP’s adoption post-lawsuit. title: INJ Aims for New Peak with Bitcoin’s Surge; Energized Altcoin Rally with Arbitrum and Rebel Satoshi
description: As Bitcoin continues its upward trajectory, the crypto market experiences a surge that propels various altcoins to new heights. Among these altcoins, Injective Protocol (INJ) stands out, showcasing impressive performance in tandem with Bitcoin’s rally. This article delves into the latest developments with INJ, the energized altcoin rally fueled by Arbitrum, and the unique narrative [...]

title: Bitcoin Layer-2 Networks Could Address Congestion Issues, Following Ethereum’s Lead
description: A recent report highlights the growth of layer-2 networks to improve Bitcoin’s scalability and functionality, addressing its congestion issues. The report compares Bitcoin’s evolving architecture to Ethereum’s, emphasizing new developments like the Lightning Network and BRC-20 token standard. A recent report emphasizes the rapidly growing creation of auxiliary layer-2 networks as a means of addressing [...]
